name: 1-1 Rocks Dropped into the River
description: A rock that falls into the river after moves in a specified direction.

fields.name: Movement Direction
fields.description: The direction in which the rock moves after being dropped into the river.

0.name: East
0.description: The rock moves to the east.

1.name: West
1.description: The rock moves to the west.

2.name: South
2.description: The rock moves to the south.

3.name: North
3.description: The rock moves to the north.
